column1: Stay effective inside a changing environment
Stay effective facing new tasks, challenges and people
Effectiveness to identify a problem and the pertinent data
Recognice relevant information of a problem and possible causes
Capacity to make actions to achive an advantage
Provide the required solutions to the client
Make decisions to assure control over methods, people and situations
Data evaluation and action lines to make logical decitions
Innovation and identification of alternative methods
Express clearly and convincingly with other persons
